GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
ASoC: ti: j721e-evm: Fix refcount leak in j721e_soc_probe_*

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 510e879420b410d88c612aecc6ca15dc6fe77473, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 6748d05590594837e42dfa975879fb275099f0b2. For more details please see the references link.
